Articles.Content:
I have had installed Kerbal Foundries installed for a while and recently if i have a craft on the ground and are in mid flight it, it still simulates the game in the background, i have checked my settings and done a mod re-install and that didnt fix it. (This problem applies to every craft if there is a craft with Kerbal Foundries
